name: USMC Subway Art Sign with Eagle, Globe & Anchor
description:
Approximate size: 9"w x 13"h  (also available 11"w x 18"h for additional fee)

You can change the colors to suit your own taste.  If no selections are made, the default is as pictured.  Lite Mocha Base, Dark Red, White and Navy Blue Lettering, Lightly Distressed.

Can be personalized with your Marine's name or made without it.

The sign is distressed on the edges to give a rustic/primitive look, but this step can be skipped if you prefer. 

In order to expedite your order, please be sure to note your color choices of both vinyl and paint in the notes section at checkout.  **PLEASE SEE CHECKOUT & COLOR SELECTIONS FOR ORDERING DETAILS**

Please know that I am using real wood for my signs, Not MDF or other manufactured wood products. Unless noted as ready to ship they are made at the time ordered.......therefore, no two signs will be exactly alike. I try my best to select the best wood that I can, however some will have the natural wood knots and "blemishes" that come along with natural wood products. We think that it adds character to the piece and assures that it doesn't have that "manufactured" look!!!

If you would like a different size or more than just one, message us and we'll be glad to work with you. Most of my designs can be made larger or smaller to fit your particular needs. Please send me a Convo to discuss your wants and needs and together we can come up with a plan that will work for everyone! Prices will be adjusted accordingly.

These are made to order so please allow 2-5 days for production of your custom item!!!

**Colors may differ in person slightly due to different computer monitor settings**

NOTE: Most all of my items/sayings can be added to wood decor for display or can be ordered as just the Vinyl to be installed on your walls, vehicles or your own decor items. If you see something you like on a board, but dont want it on a board, send me a message about just getting the vinyl. Same thing goes, if you see a Vinyl piece that you want installed on a painted board, please dont hesitate to contact me!

Tags:
Wall Hanging, Primitive, Distressed, Marine Corps, USMC, Military, Eagle Globe Anchor, EGA, Retirement, Rank

name: Ring Bearer ~ Wedding Photography Props
description:
Approximate size: 7"h x 12"w

This can say whatever you need it to and be customized to your wedding colors/theme. Typically only the top and sides are painted of my signs, but this one is painted on the back too. Can be all one color or 2 colors like this one (see other photo).

description:

name: Browning Family Vinyl Decal ~ Deer & Doe Family
description:
Approximate size: 10"w x 7"h

This Browning Family includes up to 4 Family Members.  Additional Family Members are available at an additional fee of $1.50 per member.  Please select from the drop down menu for the total number of Family Members.  (Additional members will change the overall size)

In order to expedite your order, please be sure to clarify in the notes section at checkout the following:

1. Color of Family
2. Order of your Family Members as well as the color of any applicable bow colors. 
3. Glossy or Matte Finish

Because of its higher-grade quality, our vinyl material is incredibly versatile with a multitude of indoor and outdoor application options.The rule of thumb is typically, "if it's smooth, it's safe". Incredibly versatile, the sticker can be applied to windows, cars, trucks, boats, motorcycles, netbooks, ereaders, surfboards, mirrors, cases, phones, drums, doors, lockers, computer towers, gaming hardware, game controllers, organization boxes, walls, guitars, countertops, refrigerator, macbook air or macbook pro, iPad, iPhone, and so many more! 


If you would like a different size or more than just one message us and we'll be glad to work with you. 

These are made to order and shipped QUICKLY!!

**Colors may differ in person slightly due to different computer monitor settings**

NOTE: Most all of my items/sayings can be added to wood decor for display or can be ordered as just the Vinyl to be installed on your walls, vehicles or your own decor items. If you see something you like on a board, but dont want it on a board, send me a message about just getting the vinyl. Same thing goes, if you see a Vinyl piece that you want installed on a painted board, please dont hesitate to contact me!

These are made to order so please allow 2-5 days for production of your custom item!!!

**PLEASE SEE CHECKOUT & COLOR SELECTIONS FOR ORDERING DETAILS**


Tags:
Browning, Deer, Doe, Family, Decal, Personalized, Customized

name: Custom Design Fee
description: Love my items but looking for something custom that isn't listed in the store? No worries, I love CUSTOM work and would love to work with you on a totally custom design. Whether a vinyl decal or wood sign, the sky's the limit. Just contact me and let me know what you are looking to have completed and I will let you know if I will require a "design fee" before spending time on your item. If a design fee is required, you will be forwarded back to this product listing to pay the design fee and once paid, we will work on designing your custom piece and send the mock-up for your approval and/or change requests. The design fee is non-refundable as it is used to cover our time in designing your piece. However, if you purchase the custom designed piece, the final cost of your item will have the design fee deducted from the final purchase price.
